job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} setup debug starver .DEV2 set b = `basename ${INPUTFILE0} .root` set file = flux${b}.root set logFile = flux${b}.log echo "${file}" if ( ! -r ${file}) then root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(1000,"noRunco,noHistos,ePIC,EIC,VMC,fluxVMC,nodefault,mysql","'${INPUTFILE0}'","","'${file}'")' >& ${logFile} endif
